question: The members of the panchayat are
option2: the electorates of the respective territorial constituencies
option3: nominated by local self-government minister of the state
option4: nominated by the block development organization
answer: the electorates of the respective territorial constituencies
explanation: The Members of Gram Panchayats, Panch of Gram Kutchahry, Members of Panchayat Samiti and Zila Parishad are elected directly by the electorates of the respective territorial constituencies through universal adult franchise.
